## What's Changed
* Bump esphome/workflows from 2025.4.0 to 2025.8.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/126
* Bump esphome/workflows from 2025.8.0 to 2025.8.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/127
* Use esp32 variant instead of board by @jesserockz in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/128
* Add issue template by @jesserockz in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/129
* Bump to ESPHome 2025.8.1 by @jesserockz in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/130
* Bump ESPHome version to 2025.8.2 by @bdraco in https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/pull/131


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/esphome/bluetooth-proxies/compare/25.8.1...25.8.2
